pages.text: Some blocks have designs with parts that can be repainted. For this, the paintbrush can be used. On the right side, this is visualized for a ladder, whose design has repaintable parts.

The paintbrush has an additional functionality, which is explained in the $(o)Block Collapse$() chapter. Aside from that, the paintbrush currently does not have any other functionality, but this might change in the future. Stay excited!
